definitions.title: n.pr.pl.gent.
definitions.body: Ezr 4:9, LXXL )Afrasai=oi, A )Afarsai=oi; Ges:Lex. Man. Röd:Thes. Add. 107 Hoffm:ZA ii. 55 Mey:Enst. J. 38 Persians; D1:Baer Ezr lx Scheft:75 Parsua (in Media [v. Streck:ZA xv. 308 ff.]; yetv. COT:ad loc.); Marquart:64 [[סָֽרְַיָּא]]([[א]]) secretaries ([[א]] dittogr. of preceding); oft. identify. with following, so Andr:M 53*.
